page.title: 12TRAFFIC PROBLEMS IN WANSDYKE
page.content: The local Police from Radstock helped us to find out information. Not many cars are stolen locally.However,there are quite a lot of collisions around here,mostly on main roads, especially on the A39 near Marksbury.Most people do drive too fast,especially in fog.Drivers need to obey the law.Pedestrians should keep to the pavement and 'be seen.'Motor- bikes need to be driven with great care as they are very vulnerable. Cyclists need lights,especially, and bright clothing and good brakes. Of recent accidents,there have been three fatal accidents nearby,north of Timsbury. Lots of accidents happen outside pubs.One place had two accidents happen within half an hour. { By Mark and Matthew.
